TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CurrencyManager extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase

span.span: Manages a list of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自类。The derives from the class. 使用来返回或。Use the to return either a or a . 返回的实际对象依赖于数据源和数据成员传递给属性。The actual object returned depends on the data source and data member passed to the property of the . 如果数据源，可以返回一个属性 （而不是对象的列表） 的对象的类型将是。If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the type will be a . 例如，如果你指定作为数据源，将返回。For example, if you specify a as the data source, a will be returned. 如果，另一方面，数据源是实现一个对象， ，或接口，将返回。If, on the other hand, the data source is an object that implements the , , or interface, a will be returned. 属性返回基础列表中的当前项。The property returns the current item in the underlying list. 若要更改的当前项，设置属性的新值。To change the current item, set the property to a new value. 值必须大于 0 且小于的值必须属性。The value must be greater than 0 and must be less than the value of the property. 如果基础数据源实现接口，与属性设置为`true`，你可以使用方法。If the underlying data source implements the interface, and the property is set to `true`, you can use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将绑定到中的列的控件，获取绑定，并将其位置设置。The following code example binds a control to a column in a , gets the for the binding, and sets its position. remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当数据源实现时，才支持此方法接口和数据源允许添加行 (是`true`)。This method is supported only if the data source implements the interface and the data source allows adding rows ( is `true`). > [!NOTE] > 此属性旨在允许复杂绑定控件，如控制，用于以添加要列出的新项。This property was designed to allow complex-bound controls, such as the control, to add new items to list. 只有当你创建您自己包含的控件通常使用此属性。You typically use this property only if you are creating your own control that incorporates the . 否则为若要添加项，如果数据源是，使用方法类。Otherwise, to add items if the data source is a , use the method of the class. 如果数据源是，使用方法并向其中添加行。If the data source is a , use the method and add the row to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例将新项添加到该列表与方法。The following code example adds a new item to the list with the method. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CancelCurrentEdit() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the current edit operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当包含数据源的对象实现时，才支持此方法接口。This method is supported only if the objects contained by the data source implement the interface. 如果数据源中包含的对象未实现接口，对数据所做的更改将不会被放弃。If the objects contained within the data source do not implement the interface, changes made to the data will not be discarded. > [!NOTE] > 此属性旨在由复杂数据绑定控件，如使用控制，用于以取消编辑。This property was designed to be used by complex data-bound controls, such as the control, to cancel edits. 例如，当用户按 ESC 键时，才方法调用为。For example, when the user presses the ESC key, the method is called on the for the . 除非要创建的控件要求此相同的功能，否则不应使用此方法。Unless you are creating a control that requires this same functionality, you should not use this method. 请改用方法类。Instead, use the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用当用户按 ESC 键。The following code example uses the when the user presses the ESC key. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.CancelCurrentEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ItemChanged As ItemChangedEventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the current item has been altered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户调用时，事件将会发生或方法。The event will occur when the user calls the or method. 仅当项本身已更改以某种方式发生的事件。The event occurs only when the item itself has been changed in some manner. 例如，如果项的值从 10 更改为 42，则会发生事件。For example, if the value of an item is changed from 10 to 42, the event will occur. 不应与混淆这其中项已更改为新项的事件。This should not be confused with the event where the item has been changed to a new item. 如果基础数据发生更改，也会发生该事件。The event will also occur if the underlying data changes. 例如，如果你更改的值、事件发生一次。For example, if you change the value of a , the event will occur. > [!NOTE] > 如果要创建您自己使用的控件，应使用而不是事件。If you are creating your own control that uses the , you should use the instead of the event. 属性使您能够确定已发生的操作的类型。The property of the enables you to determine the type of action that has occurred. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加事件处理程序和事件。The following code example adds event handlers for the and events. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.ItemChanged Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ListChanged As ListChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 当列表或列表中的项更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the list changes or an item in the list changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引发的类使用以下方法进行更改的项时， ，和。The event is thrown by the class when changes to an item are made using methods such as , , and . 如果它实现直接编辑数据源时，也会发生此事件接口。This event can also occur when the data source is edited directly if it implements the interface. 关联`OnListChanged`方法是在此类中的私有方法。The associated `OnListChanged` method is a private method in this class. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`CurrencyManager1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#192](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#192)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#192](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#192)]

summary.span: 指定 在列表中的当前位置。

span.span: Specifies the current position of the in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值属性大于 0，字段是一个介于 0 和减 1。If the value of the property is greater than 0, the field is a number between 0 and minus 1. 如果为 0，为-1。If is 0, is -1.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MetaDataChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 的元数据更改后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the metadata of the has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元数据包含的基础架构。The metadata of the consists of the schema of the underlying . 该架构已更改时将引发事件。The event is raised when that schema has changed. 例如，引发事件时以编程方式添加到。For example, the event is raised when a is programmatically added to a . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`CurrencyManager1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `CurrencyManager1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#193](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#193)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#193](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#193)]

span.span: An that contains the event data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int Position { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Position As Integer
public: virtual property int Position { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在列表中的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the position you are at within the list.

value.span: 0 和 减 1 之间的一个数。

span.span: A number between 0 and minus 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个重要的属性类是属性。An important property of the class is the property. 在项的列表，你可以查看整个列表之中只有一项。In a list of items, you can view only one item out of the entire list. 若要确定查看哪一项，请设置为 0 （列表的开头） 之间的数字和减 1 （列表末尾）。To determine which item is viewed, set the to a number between 0 (the beginning of the list) and minus 1 (the end of the list). 因此，确定货币或在列表中，所有控件绑定到相同的位置。Therefore, the determines the currency, or place in the list, of all controls bound to the same . 例如，假设由的名为"FirstName"和"LastName"的两个列组成的列表。For example, imagine a list consisting of two columns called "FirstName" and "LastName". 两个控件绑定到相同的列表; 第一个控件绑定到的第一列和第二个控件绑定到第二个列。Two controls are bound to the same list; the first control is bound to the first column, and the second control is bound to the second column. 当个公共设置到第三个位置中，两个控件将显示在列表中的该位置的适当的值。When the of the common is set to the third position, both controls display the appropriate values for that position in the list. 换而言之，如果"John"的名字和姓氏"Smith"的包含三个位置处的项，绑定的控件将显示"John"和"Smith"。In other words, if the item at position three consists of the first name "John" and the last name "Smith", the bound controls will display "John" and "Smith". ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性，以允许访问列表的导航。The following code examples use the property to allow navigation through a list. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Position Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Refresh() cil managed

summary.span: 强制重新填充数据绑定列表。

span.span: Forces a repopulation of the data-bound list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法进行了更改时，数据源不支持通知时 (例如，如果它是)。Use the method when the data source does not support notification when it is changed (for example, if it is an ). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个数组，并将其绑定到控制，以及然后更改一个值。The following code example creates an array and binds it to a control, and then changes one value. 可以调用方法以更新显示的值控件。The method can be called to update the value displayed by the control. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.Refresh Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub RemoveAt (index As Integer)

param.name: index
param.span: 要从列表中移除的项的索引。

span.span: The index of the item to remove from the list.
Removes the item at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在允许复杂控件，如控制，用于以从列表中删除项。The method was designed to allow complex controls, such as the control, to remove items from the list. 不应使用此方法来实际删除项。You should not use this method to actually remove items. 请改用方法类中删除项。Instead, use the method of the class to delete items. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法来删除列表中位于位置 0 处的项。The following code example uses the method to remove the item at position 0 in the list. [!code-cpp[Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CurrencyManager.RemoveAt Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ResumeBinding() cil managed

span.span: Resumes data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和允许在简单数据绑定方案中使用的临时挂起和恢复的两种方法。 and are two methods that allow the temporary suspension and resumption of in a simple data binding scenario. 如果必须允许用户对数据字段进行编辑，验证发生之前，通常会挂起数据绑定。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must be allowed to make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 例如，如果必须将一个字段更改时根据第二个，但验证第一个字段将导致将在错误中的第二个字段。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 使用防止更改推送到数据源之前称为但不会阻止数据源中的更改影响绑定的控件。Using prevents changes from being pushed into the data source until is called but does not prevent changes in the data source from affecting the bound controls. 如使用复杂数据绑定控件控制，如基于更改事件其值更新事件。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events such as the event. 调用此方法不会阻止这些事件发生。Calling this method will not prevent these events from occurring. 为此，和设计用于简单绑定控件，如。For this reason, and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as a . 或者，你可以使用这些方法在一个复杂绑定方案，如果你取消显示事件通过设置属性`false`。Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CPP/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CS/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cs#2)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/VB/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void SuspendBinding() cil managed

summary.span: 挂起数据绑定，以防止所做的更改对绑定数据源进行更新。

span.span: Suspends data binding to prevents changes from updating the bound data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法允许临时挂起和恢复数据绑定的简单绑定方案中。The and methods allow the temporary suspension and resumption of data binding in a simple binding scenario. 如果用户必须对数据字段进行一些编辑，验证发生之前，通常会挂起数据绑定。You would typically suspend data binding if the user must make several edits to data fields before validation occurs. 例如，如果必须将一个字段更改时根据第二个，但验证第一个字段将导致将在错误中的第二个字段。For example, if one field must be changed in accordance with a second, but where validating the first field would cause the second field to be in error. > [!NOTE] > 将阻止更改应用到数据源之前被调用但实际上不能阻止任何事件发生。 prevents changes from being applied to the data source until is called, but does not actually prevent any events from occurring. 如使用复杂数据绑定控件控制，如基于更改事件，其值更新事件。Controls that use complex data binding, such as the control, update their values based on change events, such as the event. 因此，调用不会阻止复杂绑定控件接收事件来更新数据源。Therefore, calling will not prevent complex-bound controls from receiving events to update the data source. 为此，和设计用于简单绑定控件，如控件。For this reason, and are designed for use with simple-bound controls, such as the control. 或者，你可以使用这些方法在一个复杂绑定方案，如果你取消显示事件通过设置属性`false`。Alternatively, you can use these methods in a complex binding scenario if you suppress events by setting the property to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-cpp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CPP/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/CS/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.cs#1)] [!code-vb[BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/BindingManagerBase_Suspend_Resume_Binding/VB/bindingmanagerbase_suspend_resume_binding.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void UpdateIsBinding() cil managed

span.span: Updates the status of the binding.
